Delete Crop Upload Upload again Cancel upload Proceed Grant Permission
Delete image? Delete images? Do you really want to delete this image?
Do you want to delete %1$d image? Do you want to delete %1$d images?
No standard app found Sorry, we could not find an app to open the file.
No email app found Sorry, we could not find an email app to send the log files.
Export Upload
Permission required The app requires permission to access the camera, otherwise it will not work. Please navigate to the app settings and request the camera permission! The app requires permission to access your files, otherwise it will not work. OK Could not authenticate with Firebase / google-services. If you are a developer, you probably want the API key. In that case, take a look at the readme. Grant camera permission Request camera permission App Settings
Taking picture Shoot anyway Locked auto-exposure Unlocked auto-exposure Tip for documents Locking exposure This locks the current exposure and white balance. Please note that we cannot lock these values, after you leave the camera view. Set text direction Do you want to change the orientation of the document text? Do not show this message again. Status:
Manual Automatic Settings
Task time (ms) Focus measure: Page segmentation:
OK
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer
Hint for automatic mode: Try to solve the issue. If that does not work, switch to manual mode and take a picture manually.
No page found Could not find a page.\n\nSolution: Place the document on another background with a higher contrast to the document.
Move closer The document is too small.\n\nSolution: Decrease the distance between camera and document.
Change perspective The document boundary is not rectangular.\n\nSolution:\n(1) Get the document as parallel to the phone as possible.\n(2) Check if the boundary found is correct.
Rotate The document is rotated.\n\nSolution:\nRotate the document so that it is parallel to your phone.
Calculating focus Please wait, until focus measure is calculated.
Not focused The document appears to be not in focus.\n\nSolution:\nChange the focus point, by tapping on a part of the document that should be focused.
Page already scanned The page is already scanned.\n\nSometimes, if the page is very similar to the preceding page, it may appear to the app that it is the same page.
OK The document quality is fine for imaging.
state unknown state unknown
movement detected The image content or the phone is moving.\n\nSolution:\n(1) Hold the document still or (2) make sure the ScanTent or phone are not moving.
Automatic mode paused Automatic mode is currently paused. No images are taken and no quality measure is applied until the automatic mode is resumed.
searching QR code The app is searching for a QR code.
auto-focusing Camera could not perform an auto focus.\n\nSolution:\nChange the focus point, by tapping on a part of the document that should be focused.
Automated imaging paused Images are now taken automatically Images are taken manually
Email Password Login Please check your login credentials. Login, please wait User name or password is incorrect. Please reenter your credentials.
Welcome %s! You have successfully logged in!
No internet connection Please connect to the internet!
Timeout error The connection to the server is taking too long to respond, please try again later!
Login to Transkribus
Switch folder Options
Unknown error An unknown error has occurred, please try again later!
Unknown server error An unknown server error has occurred, please try again later!
Export has failed! The export has failed due to an unknown error!
Document is busy! The document is currently being operated on, please try again later!
Page is busy! The page is currently being operated on, please try again later!
Upload failed The upload has failed, the pages have been modified during the upload, please try again!
Missing file for upload! The upload has failed, because a file is missing, please try again!
Missing file for export! The export has failed, because a file is missing, please try again!
Missing permission for export! The export has failed due to missing folder permissions!
Missing file! An internal file is missing!
Show grid Hide grid
Rotate 90 degrees Page boundary saved The saved page boundary is used when you transform the images. All document images can be transformed at once in the document view. Open document view
Save image
All images
Improve DocScan by sending us a log. Please note that we do not log personal data. Do you want to share your log file now? OK DocScan - Log holl@cvl.tuwien.ac.at We highly appreciate your feedback! You can leave us a comment here:
Unfortunately, the image was not saved. Please take care that it is captured. Image saving error
Transkribus
Do you really want to logout? You will have to login again if you want to automatically upload your images. Logout Cancelg>
Session expired! Your session has expired, please login again!
Exporting PDF PDF exported! %s has been successfully exported. PDF export has failed! An error happened while creating your pdf, sorry!
Uploading %s %s uploaded! %s has been successfully uploaded. Upload for %s has failed!
QR code invalid Sorry, the QR code is invalid. Url not valid The following URL cannot be opened in browser:
Select a document
Delete Are you sure you want to delete the document? This cannot be undone. upload pending processing, please wait upload scheduled, will begin shortly you have to connect to an unmetered network (e.g. wifi) to proceed! Delete item - active %1$d image %1$d images Cannot start upload You are currently not logged in, please log in first.
Documents Images PDFs
Open Source Licenses
DocScan 2020 Version: Built: Show DocScan intro Open Source Licenses DocScan is developed together with the ScanTent device. Visit our website for more information: \nhttps://scantent.eu DocScan features image uploads to Transkribus. Visit the Transkribus website for further information: \nhttps://transkribus.eu #
This app is especially designed for the ScanTent.\nIf you own a ScanTent: Please put your document inside. Place your phone on the ScanTent Start the automatic mode in the app The text orientation can be changed in the settings Flip pages - images are captured automatically.\n Your scanned images are grouped into documents.\nDocuments can be exported as PDF and uploaded. Trigger flash after automatic imaging to show that an image has been taken. Create a document now Skip
Edit document Save changes
Create new document Document name Create document Show Transkribus metadata Authority This metadata is uploaded to Transkribus but not to other cloud storages. Author Writer Genre Signature URL Allow image publication Handwriting language Please select a language Allow image publication: Yes No Please fill out all Readme2020 fields Please select type Project: readme2020 Help Transkribus to train an HTR model for modern handwritings. Custom file naming Preview: Please enter a prefix first Prefix must not be empty
Upload Metered networks Enable uploads over metered networks (mobile data, VPNs). Additional charges by your provider may arise. Image processing Fast page detection Measure focus Fast page detection with a potential loss of accuracy Display grid Overlays a grid on the camera view Flash after imaging Activates the flash for a second to show that a picture has been taken. This applies only to the series mode. Crash Reports Firebase Crashlytics Anonymous crash reporting is enabled. Help us to find and fix issues more quickly by enabling anonymous crash reporting.
Debug settings Live preview Debug settings Show focus values
Show debug view Show computation time of several tasks on top of the camera preview.
Debug settings Settings used mainly for development and measurement of the app performance.
Use Transkribus test server Please restart the app, if you change this. Warning: This setting should only be used for testing the app and the Transkribus server.
Extended debug messages Dialogs will show extended information about the errors which occur, this setting is only honored for debug builds!
Use aggressive auto-focus Every new page is auto-focused in series mode.
Show HUD button Shows a button in the camera view for mirroring the screen. This is useful if you use a mirror or a Head Up Display (HUD) with your ScanTent.
Exif settings Default metadata values saved within images Photographer
Copyright
None
Untitled document
Please wait while the page is detected Retake image This will replace the current image with a newly taken one. Do you want to proceed? Retake
Select all items selected Rotate right OCR not available Sorry, we could not find Google Play services. Try to reinstall the app via Google Play store. Do you want to generate a PDF without OCR? Make PDF machine readable? This will apply OCR and make the text in the picture(s) selectable.
Upload? Do you really want to upload the document?
Cancel upload? Do you want to cancel the upload for the document?
Uploads cancelled! Due to the recent constraint change, all of your scheduled and running uploads have been cancelled.
No documents\nPlease create a document first! No active document\nPlease select a document first! No images for document\nPlease take an image first!
Crop images Upload Cancel Upload Save as PDF Delete Edit document Continue imaging
Share
Rotate left Rotate right

The %1$s has been successfully initiated!
Already uploaded The document is already uploaded. Do you want to upload it again?
Uncropped images The document is not cropped!
Duplicate entry There is already an existing entity!
Entry missing The entry cannot be found in the database!
Crop Are you sure you want to crop all images in the document? This cannot be undone. Uncropped images Some images are not cropped.\nDo you want to proceed with the upload? Some images are not cropped.\nDo you want to proceed with the export? Delete Are you sure you want to delete the pdf? This cannot be undone. Permission given You can now proceed and export documents to pdf.
Permission required Your permission is required to show the pdf\'s, which have been saved in the documents folder. Do you want to grant your permission for this folder now?
No document created There is already a document with the same name, please choose another name!
